trans-unit.source: Azure Backup in 10mins | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Azure Backup in 10mins | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Get started with Azure Backup in 10mins
trans-unit.target: Get started with Azure Backup in 10mins

trans-unit.source: Try Azure Backup in 10mins
trans-unit.target: Try Azure Backup in 10mins

trans-unit.source: It is extremely easy to setup Azure Backup and the following how-to videos will help you get started.
trans-unit.target: It is extremely easy to setup Azure Backup and the following how-to videos will help you get started.

trans-unit.source: Step 1: Get an Azure subscription
trans-unit.target: Step 1: Get an Azure subscription

trans-unit.source: If you don't have an Azure subscription, you can get started with a free trial offer which lets you access any Azure service.
trans-unit.target: If you don't have an Azure subscription, you can get started with a free trial offer which lets you access any Azure service.

trans-unit.source: Visit the following link [http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/free-trial/](http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/free-trial) to learn more.
trans-unit.target: Visit the following link [http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/free-trial/](http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/free-trial) to learn more.

trans-unit.source: You can skip this step you have an Azure subscription.
trans-unit.target: You can skip this step you have an Azure subscription.

trans-unit.source: Step 2: Configure the Azure Backup service
trans-unit.target: Step 2: Configure the Azure Backup service

trans-unit.source: Go through the steps mentioned in the video [Getting Started with Azure Backup 1 of 3 - Set up a backup vault on Azure](http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/videos/getting-started-with-azure-backup-1-of-3-set-up-a-backup-vault-on-azure/) to:
trans-unit.target: Go through the steps mentioned in the video [Getting Started with Azure Backup 1 of 3 - Set up a backup vault on Azure](http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/videos/getting-started-with-azure-backup-1-of-3-set-up-a-backup-vault-on-azure/) to:

trans-unit.source: Create a backup vault
trans-unit.target: Create a backup vault

trans-unit.source: Download the "vault credentials"
trans-unit.target: Download the "vault credentials"

trans-unit.source: Download the Azure Backup agent
trans-unit.target: Download the Azure Backup agent

trans-unit.source: Step 3: Prepare your on-premises machine
trans-unit.target: Step 3: Prepare your on-premises machine

trans-unit.source: Go through the steps mentioned in the video [Getting Started with Azure Backup 2 of 3 - Prepare your production server for Azure Backup](http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/videos/getting-started-with-azure-backup-2-of-3-prepare-your-production-server-for-azure-backup/) to:
trans-unit.target: Go through the steps mentioned in the video [Getting Started with Azure Backup 2 of 3 - Prepare your production server for Azure Backup](http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/videos/getting-started-with-azure-backup-2-of-3-prepare-your-production-server-for-azure-backup/) to:

trans-unit.source: Install the Azure Backup agent on your Windows Server/client or DPM server.
trans-unit.target: Install the Azure Backup agent on your Windows Server/client or DPM server.

trans-unit.source: Register the machine against the backup vault
trans-unit.target: Register the machine against the backup vault

trans-unit.source: Step 4: Backup and restore data
trans-unit.target: Step 4: Backup and restore data

trans-unit.source: Go through the steps mentioned in the video [Getting Started with Azure Backup 3 of 3 - Start backing up your production server](http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/videos/getting-started-with-azure-backup-3-of-3-start-backing-up-your-production-server/) to:
trans-unit.target: Go through the steps mentioned in the video [Getting Started with Azure Backup 3 of 3 - Start backing up your production server](http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/videos/getting-started-with-azure-backup-3-of-3-start-backing-up-your-production-server/) to:

trans-unit.source: Backup data from a server
trans-unit.target: Backup data from a server

trans-unit.source: Restore backed up data from Azure
trans-unit.target: Restore backed up data from Azure

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: To learn more about Azure Backup, see [Azure Backup Overview](backup-introduction-to-azure-backup.md)
trans-unit.target: To learn more about Azure Backup, see [Azure Backup Overview](backup-introduction-to-azure-backup.md)

trans-unit.source: Back up Windows Server
trans-unit.target: Back up Windows Server

trans-unit.source: Visit the [Azure Backup Forum](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=290933).
trans-unit.target: Visit the [Azure Backup Forum](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=290933).

trans-unit.target: test
